item.title: Update 0.1!
item.description: Hello! Update 0.1 comes with our starting commands! Read more in the about section!

item.title: About Hypixel Stats
item.description: Hypixel Stats Bot is a discord bot that is aimed to help you access your statistics on discord. You can invite it here! It currently has 6 commands: bwstats, ban, gameplayercount, player, playercount, skywarsstats It’s made with discord.py, an asynchronous wrapper for the discord bot api. Prefix is ~ You can use each command like this: ~ban [member] Bans a member. ~bwstats [player] Gets bedwars stats of player. ~gameplayercount [game] Gets player count of a game.
